Player History
Drafted in 5th round, 90th overall pick, by Philadelphia in 1967...
Released by Philadelphia on 4/1/1969...
Signed as a free agent by Baltimore on 3/1/1971 to a minor league contract.
Drafted in 5th round, 90th overall pick, by Minnesota in 1975...
Drafted in 6th round, 104th overall pick, by Baltimore in 1987...
Injured on 6/22/1988 with a Inflamed Rotator Cuff Muscle, out for 5 weeks...
Injured on 5/2/1989 with a Torn Anterior Cruciate Ligament, out for full season...
Injured on 8/28/1990 with a Blister On Finger, out for 6 days...
Had first career hit on 4/3/1993, off Joel McKeon (BOS)...
